data.name: Battle Brothers - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The original soundtrack to Battle Brothers featuring two full hours of orchestral music, including signature themes for all the places and factions in the game. Composed and produced by Breakdown Epiphanies (Patrick Delaney and Dennis Meyer).

1. Battle Brothers
2. Thug Life (Brigands)
3. Alleys of Weissenhaven
4. The Humming Hills
5. Bone March (Undead)
6. The Black Iron Pact (Orcs)
7. Nightfall in Valeshire
8. Laying Siege to Hammerburg (Nobles)
9. Traversing the Northern Clanlands
10. The Pillage
11. Hoggart's Hideout (Brigands)
12. The Homestead

14. Unleashing the Clans (Orcs)
15. The Hunt (Beasts)
16. Making a Name
17. Bloody Toll

23. Walls of Dunenburg

27. Grinded in the Gears of War

29. Mercenary's Rest
30. Forging a Legacy (Release Trailer)
